misc: Appreciates the thoughtful course designs of Kosti Kuronen who passed away in 2024
biography: Ofri, a golfer hailing from Golf Pirkkala and residing in the vibrant city of Tampere, Finland, is set to make his third appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025.

While Ofri is still seeking his first victory at the Hector Trophée, his dedication to the sport is evident. Known for his contemplative nature, Ofri brings a strategic approach to the greens, carefully analyzing each challenge before him.

Ofri holds a deep appreciation for the intricate and thoughtful course designs of the late Kosti Kuronen, finding inspiration in the challenges they present. His presence undoubtedly enriches the competitive spirit of the tournament, and spectators eagerly anticipate his performance in the upcoming Hector Trophée.
